latest.title: Repetitions and Tagging
latest.description: **IchiBot** got a new major update ~nya!  Some QoL changes, and a BIG new feature - tags!

fields.name: Rerolling For Action
fields.value: Riichi/Battle music is now initialized as a randomized playlist where it cycles through them all one by one instead of picking a new random one every consecutive click.

fields.name: Tags For Tracks
fields.value: You can now apply tags to the music you curated for your Riichi/Battle music with the new `t|ag` command. Use `-help tag` for further details.
Enjoy the update, and please report any bugs ~nya!

v3.2.0.title: Jukebox Update!
v3.2.0.description: **IchiBot** got a new major update ~nya! It has to do with the Jukebox, plus a few bugfixes and optimizations.

fields.name: __[a|b], [h|r] and now [j]__
fields.value: A third parameter has now been implemented - `j|jukebox`. Upload new tracks using this tag, and they will exclusively be saved for the Jukebox.

fields.name: __Jukebox Playback Modes!__
fields.value: Replacing the quick exit, you can now toggle the Jukebox's playback behavior to play in order, repeat, shuffle, or only play once.
Enjoy the update, and please report any bugs ~nya!
